# Gradient Color Stops

| Class                    | Support     |
| ------------------------ | ----------- |
| `from-inherit`           | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `from-current`           | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `from-transparent`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `from-black`             | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `from-white`             | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `from-{n}`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `from-[n]`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-inherit`            | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-current`            | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-transparent`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-black`              | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-white`              | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-{n}`                | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `via-[n]`                | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-inherit`             | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-current`             | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-transparent`         | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-black`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-white`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-{n}`                 | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `to-[n]`                 | ğŸŒ Web only |
